channel.title: One last simple script needed
channel.description:
well I know I've been asking for a lot latley, but I plan to give it back to the community eventually. here is what I want the script to do:
I need a script that can find a color and every time it finds that color, it clicks the left mouse button. so say the entire game board is green then a red dot would appear. the mouse would go to the red dot and click it. (I was just using some random game, the game im using it on is difrent.

item.title: One last simple script needed
item.dc:creator: @kingprotos kingprotos
item.description:
@kingprotos wrote:

crud the script makes my whole comp lag like hell.

ohh well I’m giving up on cheating on that game anyway

Read full topic

item.title: One last simple script needed
item.dc:creator: @danrox2004 danrox2004
item.description:
@danrox2004 wrote:

[quote=“kingprotos, post:4, topic:62336”][quote author=danrox2004 link=topic=89887.msg955417#msg955417 date=1172822528]
[scar]program Colorthing;
var
width, height: integer;
x, y: integer;
const
Color= 16777215; //Colour goes here
begin
GetClientDimensions(width,height);
repeat
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color,0,0,width,height,5)) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true)
until(IsFKeyDown(12))
end.[/scar]
replace color with the colour you want.
[/quote]

I 1337 you =P[/quote]
Lol?

Read full topic
